description: Extracts structured data from a web page using an AgentQL query or a Natural Language description.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your AgentQL API key from dev.agentql.com

inputs.name: url
inputs.info: The URL of the public web page you want to extract data from.

inputs.name: query
inputs.info: The AgentQL query to execute. Learn more at https://docs.agentql.com/agentql-query or use a prompt.

inputs.name: prompt
inputs.info: A Natural Language description of the data to extract from the page. Alternative to AgentQL query.

inputs.name: is_stealth_mode_enabled
inputs.info: Enable experimental anti-bot evasion strategies. May not work for all websites at all times.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.info: Seconds to wait for a request.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.info: 'standard' uses deep data analysis, while 'fast' trades some depth of analysis for speed.

inputs.name: wait_for
inputs.info: Seconds to wait for the page to load before extracting data.

inputs.name: is_scroll_to_bottom_enabled
inputs.info: Scroll to bottom of the page before extracting data.

inputs.name: is_screenshot_enabled
inputs.info: Take a screenshot before extracting data. Returned in 'metadata' as a Base64 string.
